display_long_description: Reject Humanity. Run, climb, and jump in VR using a unique locomotion method that only needs the movement of your hands and arms. No buttons, no sticks, no teleportation. Push off of surfaces to jump and squeeze them with both hands to climb. There are many different maps  - From a simple forest that you can chill in, or an ice map with a slide or two. The Zero Gravity, map the map that takes your gravity. The Kitchen-Living room is two rooms with some cosmetics and a tv. Run from the monsters that you may encounter. Parkour up walls and swim in the water. Hang out in a virtual jungle with randos or group up with your friends on a server and just hangout with them. The stakes are low, so feel free to just chat or make up your own games. The movement is easy to learn, and hard to master. So play with anyone on any platform. There are many different environments to explore. Each with their own topography that forms routes and obstacles to play on. Visit our store in the Store room, with a rotating Cosmetics of items to buy, play with, and wear to express your true monke. Become Gorilla.
